archiefmat.titel: Stadhouderschap in relatie tot de West-Indische Compagnie en Suriname
archiefmat.titel_eng: Stadtholdership in relation to the West India Company and Suriname
archiefmat.scope:
Nos. 1855, 1858, 1860 concerning Curaçao; nos. 1862-1864, 1866 concerning Demerara and Essequibo; 1865 Essequibo only; no. 1857 is related to St. Eustatius; no. 1856 is related to St. Martin; nos. 1850-1852, 1854 concerning Suriname; nos. 1845-1849, 1859-1861 are related to West India in general (see also no. 2258).

Mostly correspondence.
archiefmat.notes:
Only approved consultation permitted.

Nos. 1855, 1858, 1860 concerning Curaçao; nos. 1862-1864, 1866 concerning Demerara and Essequibo; no. 1865 Essequibo only; no. 1857 is related to St Eustatius; no. 1856 is related to St Martin; nos. 1850-1852, 1854 concerning Suriname; nos. 1845-1849, 1859-1861 are related to the Netherlands West Indies in general (see also no. 2258). No. 1851, see also Collection G2 Willem graaf Bentinck. Mostly correspondence.
